statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT behavior_description FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING behavior_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_behavior_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM suspicious_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM suspicous_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM suspicious_activity
SELECT user_id, SUM(theft_amount) AS total_theft_amount FROM identity_theft GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_theft_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_activity_time FROM suspicious_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_activity_time ASC
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_datetime DESC;
SELECT location FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM identity_theft_reports;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE detection_probability > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, location FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND location LIKE '%IP%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_datetime >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_datetime FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY activity_datetime DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, detection_probability FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE detection_probability > 0.8 ORDER BY detection_probability DESC, pattern_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, check_type, result FROM identity_checks WHERE result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com' AND username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR email = 'admin@example.com';
SELECT u.user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts_count FROM users u JOIN login_attempts la ON u.user_id = la.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY login_attempts_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_time FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 3 AND activity_description LIKE '%suspicious%';
SELECT u.username, s.log_message, s.log_time FROM users u INNER JOIN security_logs s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 4 ORDER BY s.log_time ASC;
